extendedInfo.description: Simple app to get your Device ID/Android ID ,Google Services Framework ID,IMEI / MEID, Subscriber ID (IMSI), SIM Card Serial, WiFi MAC Address and Ethernet MAC Address that allow you easily copy and share the ID of your mobile device. An ideal tool for both developers and user.More features will be added soon. (Please leave suggestion)NOTE: this app doesn't require INTERNET permission so your information is safe.Supported :Google Services Framework Key IDAndroid IDIMEI / MEIDSubscriber ID (IMSI)SIM Card SerialWiFi MAC AddressEthernet MAC AddressREAD_PHONE_STATE is used to get your IMEI, IMSI and SIM SerialACCESS_WIFI_STATE is used to get your MAC Address---------For user that wanted to get both SIM Serial in DUAL SIM Phone, The default SDK does not have support to handle dual SIM phones. The function will only return one number, most likely from the first active SIM card.---------Instead of rating 1 or 2 star,please email to support@evozi.com or leave a comment so that we can fix or improve it.Links :Facebook : http://facebook.com/evozi/Beta Testing Group : https://www.facebook.com/groups/evozi/NOTICE :Leaving comments such as âDoesn't work.â and rating 1 star surely won't get you any help. Kindly contacting us directly is proven to give much better results, and higher levels of satisfaction for everybody. :)Please write an email if you have any problems, questions or feature requests. We can not answer on comments in the market.Due to the vast amount of android devices it might not work perfectly on everyone's device, but we are working hard to get it there. If you have problems on your device contact support@evozi.com and we will try to fix your problem in the next version.

reviews.title: ANDROID DEVICE I.D.
reviews.comment: This ifs very handy to have!  It gives you every I.D. number associated with your device.  I happen to be using the Galaxy SIII.
reviews.author: Greg Hamm

reviews.title: Simple and convenient
reviews.comment: Nice apps. Easy to use and very usefull.
reviews.author: Eugene Joseph

reviews.title: Useful tool.
reviews.comment: Convenient way to get phone data. Useful when you need to call support. A \"share all\" function could be useful.
reviews.author: David Lawson

reviews.title: As simple as an app should be!
reviews.comment: Too many apps have to much crap and aren\'t as simple as they should be. This app keeps the simple minimalistic bug-free layout we all know and love. Kudos.
reviews.author: Andy Chamberlain

reviews.title: Very simple, very nice...
reviews.comment: This app is straight forward and gives you all the essential information you might require...
reviews.author: Andy Caisley-Rodgers

reviews.title: This app is a must have tool !!!
reviews.comment: Lately every other app on the market has started putting ads in notifications.You can opt out with this device info, it took me two hours to find this exact info that you made available to me at the push of a button literally! I just wish I had found this sooner.!! :-) I will tell everyone I know and posting on every site. Thanks so much for sharing this with us. I do think you will see a lot more traffic due to this new way of advertising..
